subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Two days after Dale Earnhardt Inc. and Ginn Racing joined forces, Robert Yates Racing and the open-wheel powerhouse Newman/Haas/Lanigan announced their intention to form a Nascar partnership.The deal, which would rename the team Yates/Newman/Haas/Lanigan Racing, is expected to give the Yates team a big boost, particularly in engineering and marketing. Newman/Haas/Lanigan Racing, co-owned by Paul Newman, the racing entrepreneur Carl Haas and the businessman Michael Lanigan, is the most successful team in the Champ Car World Series.
